mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (member_id, account_id, name, phone, membership_type, membership_start_date, membership_end_date, status) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{accountId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{membershipType}, #{membershipStartDate}, #{membershipEndDate}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, account_id AS accountId, name, phone, membership_type AS membershipType, membership_start_date AS membershipStartDate, membership_end_date AS membershipEndDate, status FROM members WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
